changeSet.author: gbenevelli
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `players` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `gsis_id` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `first_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `last_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `full_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `gsis_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `height` int(11) NOT NULL, `number` int(11) NOT NULL, `profile_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `profile_url` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `weight` int(11) NOT NULL, `years_pro` int(11) NOT NULL, `birthdate` varchar(255), `college` varchar(255), `status` varchar(255), `team` varchar(255), `position` varchar(255), PRIMARY KEY (`gsis_id`), INDEX `id_index` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;

changeSet.author: gbenevelli
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `games` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `eid` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `home` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `away` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `day` int(11) NOT NULL, `gamekey` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `month` int(11) NOT NULL, `season_type` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `time` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `meridiem` varchar(255), `wday` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `week` int(11) NOT NULL, `year` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`eid`), INDEX `id_index` (`id`), INDEX `year_index` (`year`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;

changeSet.author: gbenevelli
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `player_id_import_log` ( `gsis_id` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `year` int(11) NOT NULL, `basic_info_imported` BOOLEAN NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`gsis_id`), INDEX `year_index` (`year`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
